mapper.select: SELECT g.GOODS_NO, g.GOODS_TEAM, g.GOODS_PRODUCT_NAME, g.GOODS_PRICE, gi.GOODS_IMAGE_WEB_PATH AS goodsImageWebPath FROM GOODS g LEFT JOIN GOODS_IMAGE gi ON g.GOODS_NO = gi.GOODS_NO WHERE g.GOODS_CATEGORY = #{category} AND gi.GOODS_IMAGE_REP_YN = 'Y' -- 대표 이미지 조건 추가

SELECT g.GOODS_NO, g.GOODS_TEAM, g.GOODS_PRODUCT_NAME, g.GOODS_PRICE, gi.GOODS_IMAGE_WEB_PATH AS goodsImageWebPath FROM GOODS g LEFT JOIN GOODS_IMAGE gi ON g.GOODS_NO = gi.GOODS_NO WHERE g.GOODS_TEAM = #{team} AND gi.GOODS_IMAGE_REP_YN = 'Y' -- 대표 이미지 조건 추가

SELECT * FROM GOODS WHERE GOODS_PRODUCT_NAME LIKE '%' || #{searchValue} || '%' OR GOODS_PRODUCT_CODE LIKE '%' || #{searchValue} || '%' OR GOODS_TEAM LIKE '%' || #{searchValue} || '%' OR GOODS_CATEGORY LIKE '%' || #{searchValue} || '%'
SELECT * FROM GOODS WHERE GOODS_PRODUCT_NAME LIKE '%' || #{productName} || '%'
